instructions.price: Look for element with class css-1po23rs and text color #AA2E25 (red sale price) next to crossed out price, or p.css-pfatic with text color #1D1D1D (regular price). Ignore URL numbers like '3662p.html'.
instructions.quantity: Keep original units - if '1kg' use quantity '1' and unit 'kg', if '900g' use quantity '900' and unit 'g', if '90 capsules' use quantity '90' and unit 'capsules'.
